q: NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . high level, smart enough to anticipate things before they happen. But all do their best work in the comfort of the pocket. "It has to be a feel thing," Aaron Rodgers said. I think pocket presence is something that you can learn a little bit, but a lot of it is just feeling your way through that, knowing when to stay in there and when to get out. I think I've done a better job over the last season of knowing when to get out and when to hang in there. The 6-2, 225-pound Aaron Rodgers ranked third among quarterbacks and 26th overall in rushing, totaling 356 yards and four touchdowns on 64 carries( 5.6 average). Only Philadelphia's Michael Vick averaged more yards per carry

same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race. "I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.
